commit message: New screenshots
Readme updated

Logs the tread names

Bypass thread pool queue if the thread already comes from the pool
to avoid deadlocks and needed for the password command.
Make socket streams thread local
Spelling and formatting fixes.

Merge pull request #367 from avuton/master

Spelling and formatting fixes.
some additions
public methods in MPDConnection
make some private members protected or public

Try to better tune the socket timeout for each connection.
Give more time for the status connection before closing the socket seems to improve reactivity.

Merge pull request #368 from hurzl/ext

Some extensions as a preparation for album artist and cache handling

Regroup checkMonitorNeeded() and checkConnectionNeeded() in checkConnectionNeeded().
Allow to use the checkConnectionNeeded() scheduler also for the checkMonitorNeeded() operation.
That way we do not stop/start/stop ... the connection monitor and this avoid some views (small nowplaying screen) to blink.
Readme fixes
Remove Lastfm-java from the readme

Check that connections are not null in the isConnected() method.
Avoid null pointer exception if a getStatus() requests happens before connect().
Increase socket timeout for commands. Avoids some non retryable commands (next) to fail when the network is slow.

Fix success/failure status

Try to improve non retryable command (next, delete ...) processing.
Let them be retried if the command has not been sent to the server of if the server did not answer.

Send a ping command (reconnect if needed) on all connections when a failure is detected on one connection.
The idea is to restore the dead connections quicker.

filter, the port attribute and all the path attributes are ignored.

Improved URI Handlers

This commit adds plain file pathPatterns and mimeTypes (streaming
only). This commit also fixes the pathPatterns which uses a basic
glob pattern with (double) escaping for XML.

Merge pull request #390 from hurzl/ext2

Small misc. fixes

Add classpath files for projects without.

Add classpath files for projects without them, this will
significantly cut down on eclipse initial import errors.

Merge pull request #392 from avuton/master

Add classpath files for projects without.

Update Intellij Configuration
- Take into account the new modules (PullToRefresh, SmoothProgressBar)
- Tested with Intellij  Community Edition 13.0.1

Fix #366 : [Wishlist] Allow Mpdroid to connect even if no network connection is detected
- Do not check if the device has internet connection, just try to connect.
If no network is available, the error connection popup displays a message like 'Unreachable Network'.
The error message appeared quickly during tests without network.

Fix #370 : Mpdroid 1.06 beta 8 Constant spinners in Artist Album view.

The cover progress bar is now invisible by default.

Fix cover fetching for Gracenote
Update Gracenote API Endpoint

Attempt to fix the max connection issue
- Do no connect MPD if it is already connected (may happen at app start when 2 views ask for a connection)
- Synchronize connect/disconnect in MPD
- Use only 3 connections (instead of 5) for commands
- Decrease the socket timeout on the status connection for it to be closed
quicker

Add more extensions to pathPattern for intent.

pathPattern is case sensitive, so, include the all uppercase and
lowercase in file extensions; anything else will fail as it should.
Add gen to the PullToRefresh project classpath.
droid.widget.FrameLayout#onConfigurationChange minimum API level 8.

Remove dead code.

Remove unused functions, imports, variables and disable unused debug
functions.
java.util.Arrays#copyOf requires minimum API level 9.
android.graphics.drawable.Animatable requires minimum API level 4.

Merge pull request #397 from avuton/master

Lots of removals
Fix : The NowPlaying elapsed time now resets back to 0:00 on resume

Fix album cover fetching
Case issue when removing disc references from albums (like CD1, disc02 ...)

Suppress warning about num going unused.

Suppress warning about num going unused, it's actually iterated and
apparently this warning is emitted, regardless.

Prevent resource leaks by closing record after use.

MessageOutputStream needs to be closed after use to prevent resource
leaks.

Prevent resource leaks by closing message after use.

MessageOutputStream needs to be closed after use. With that, the
appropriate IOExceptions need to be accounted for.

Replace a terniary statement something easier to read.

Replace a terniary statement with something that's not only easier
to read but cleans up a warning at the same time.

Add a few more known common file streaming extensions.

With these, anything at dir.xiph.org should be able to be added by intent.

ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT is depreciated.

ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT has been depreciated for drop in replacement
ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT.
Remove strings which were removed from code in commit dd4bc9fc0.
Remove string removed from code in e3edb35.

Use Integer.valueOf over new Integer.

Integers in .valueOf are cached and will likely provide enhanced performance.
Remove layout referee to ImageButton disabled by commit 25948a0.
Remove two strings that appear to be arbitrary.

Fix layout_above attribute.

seekLayout doesn't exist, it appears to have been replaced with progress_layout
some time ago.

Merge pull request #401 from avuton/master

A large group of small fixes, tweaks and cleanups

Improve album cover fetching - Try once to fetch the cover then in case of failures re-try with a normalized name for artist and album (removing special characters ...) - Exclude the cache and locale fetcher from this - Refactor this check to be done in the CoverManager.

Add a cover fetcher for Itunes
May be a replacement for GraceNote but the image quality is not huge (200X200).

Add a cover fetcher for Itunes
Change cover fetcher priority

Add a cover fetcher for Itunes
Change cover fetcher priority

Restore the encoding property display in portrait mode
The constraint : 'android:layout_above='@+id/progress_layout'' (coming from 797b7d32aacaf27a60fceb35796d4b60547ffe46) seems logical but refrains the encoding text to be displayed.
I guess the vertical space is not big enough to display everything.
Looks ok without this constraint.
Cannot figure out a better fix now.

Add a cover fetcher for Itunes
Change cover fetcher priority
Put it in second place because we now have access to good quality images.
Since it is in second position do not fallback on low quality images in case of failure with the high res image.

The user can now set a custom GraceNote Client ID
- The default client ID is used if nothing is defined.
- Have to restart the app when you change it (a preference listener has been set but it does not work yet)

Minor fix in the PreferenceScreen layout
Define layout_height and layout_width to remove warnings.

Add cover debug : Display cover retriever name
When the CoverManager is in DEBUG mode the cover retriever name (Lastfm ...) is displayed as a notification (toast)

Fix MusicBrainz Cover Fetcher
- Use release-group instead of release for albums. (http://musicbrainz.org/doc/Release_Group)
- Use an Http connection instead of an HttpClient to perform request to the web service to be able to handle redirections easily. It is now needed to fetch covers from them.

Move volume bar visibility to updateStatus
Typo
Replace all ... with &#8230 (ellipsis character)

Convert px to dp for spacing.

dp is preferred for spacing, unless using px is absolutely necessary.

Remove needStoppedNotification and notification build onDestroy().

This appears to be debugging code and would never be called.
Remove color streaming notification for icon on unsupported APIs.

Remove all code targeting old APIs

Note: Some code referenced Build.VERSION.SDK_INT > 14 which probably should
have been Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= 14 due to nothing of significance happening
between API 14 & 15.
A string resource exists for OK, use it.
Remove unused colors.
Remove unused mpd_browsermenu.

Add contentDescription to all ImageViews.

Add contentDescription to all ImageViews which is used primarily for
accessibility.
Remove unused resources (layout).
Remove unused resources (drawable).

Comment out unused strings.

Comment out unused strings. Once they're gone, they're hard to get
people to translate, and many of them are very general and possibly
useful again in the future.
Remove unused actionbar dimensions.

Remove invalid attribute.

layout_weight is valid in TextView, but not in the LinearLayout.
Add string for 'Default connection'.

baselineAligned=false for better performance, when possible.

This is a bit of a test. I tested this on both Nexus 10 / Nexus 7
and unless I missed something, it looks exactly like it did.

Replace duplicate ids with unique ids in the same (parent) FrameLayout.

This was a bug just waiting to be exploited.
